name: checkmate
description: Checkmate is a self-hosted uptime and performance monitoring platform. It checks websites or APIs, sends alerts on downtime, and provides dashboards for visualizing availability history and performance data.
features: Uptime Monitoring: Check website and API availability continuously. Stay online.
Downtime Alerts: Instant notifications when services go down. Quick response.
Performance Tracking: Monitor response times and performance metrics. Optimize speed.
Availability History: Visualize uptime history with dashboards. Track reliability.
Multi-Endpoint: Monitor multiple websites and APIs. Comprehensive coverage.
Status Pages: Public status pages for transparency. Customer communication.
Self-Hosted: Keep monitoring data on your infrastructure. Data privacy.
